edu.csupomona.cs.cs141.prog_assgmnt_team

Class GUIEntity

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.csupomona.cs.cs141.prog_assgmnt_team.GUIEntity
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Display, Menu, NinjaSprite, PlayerSprite, PowerUpSprite, RoomSprite, Shadow

    public abstract class GUIEntity
extends java.lang.Object
    This class creates the sprite and saves the sprites location on the screen.

    • Constructor Detail

      • GUIEntity

        public GUIEntity(java.lang.String fileName,
         int startX,
         int startY,
         int width,
         int hieght,
         int x,
         int y)
        Constructor loads sprite form file and set the position of the sprite.
        Parameters:
        fileName - name of the file.
        startX - Where X position of the sprite starts in sprite sheet.
        startY - Where Y position of the sprite starts in sprite sheet.
        width - Width of the sprite.
        hieght - hieght of the sprite.
        x - location X of the sprite on screen.
        y - location Y of the sprite on screen.

      • GUIEntity

        public GUIEntity(java.lang.String fileName,
         int startX,
         int startY,
         int width,
         int hieght,
         int x,
         int y,
         int frames)
        Constructor loads sprite form file and set the position of the animated sprite.
        Parameters:
        fileName - name of the file.
        startX - Where X position of the sprite starts in sprite sheet.
        startY - Where Y position of the sprite starts in sprite sheet.
        width - Width of the sprite.
        hieght - hieght of the sprite.
        x - location X of the sprite on screen.
        y - location Y of the sprite on screen.
        frames - how many frames a sprite is made of.
